reviewText: Despite allegations of sexual abuse against her ex-husband, Jody (Faith Ford) has lost a custody battle for her daughter Samantha (Hanna Hall) and faces a choice of turning her over to him, or taking flight and risking kidnapping charges.Pursued by both the FBI and a private detective, Jody and Samantha become hunted animals, fleeing from town to town with the help of an Underground Railroad set up to help women and children escape abuse.
summary: Damned If You Do...Damned If You Don't

reviewText: Very well-done drama of a true story.  I recall following these events in the news.  It details all the pros & cons of the decision the mother was forced to make due to a judge's incompetence - which continues to occur today.
